name: Lost Wallet (Xiiao)
description:
Solo Game Jam

 Lost Wallet
Controls : W,A,S,D for movement
L.Click to Interact
T for the phone

Features :
- You need to find an airtag in your house that is considered like a wallet (Gray Cylinder)
- You can ring all AirTag at once
- You need to wear HEADPHONE almost avery sound are spatialized

Description :
You come back of work, you wanted pizza at your house when you come back. You lay down a bit in the sofa when the delivery is at your door but Where is your wallet ?

/!\ bug warning /!\ Let all dialogue finish take your time there is no limit time in the game
